00032     class CMS_API CMSProperties {
00033     public:
00034 
00035         virtual ~CMSProperties(){}
00036 
00042         virtual bool isEmpty() const = 0;

00052         virtual const char* getProperty( const std::string& name ) const = 0;

00065             const std::string& name,
00066             const std::string& defaultValue ) const = 0;
00067 
00077         virtual void setProperty(
00078             const std::string& name,
00079             const std::string& value ) = 0;
00080 
00088         virtual bool hasProperty( const std::string& name ) const = 0;
00089 
00096         virtual void remove( const std::string& name ) = 0;
00097 
00105         virtual std::vector< std::pair< std::string, std::string > > toArray() const = 0;
00106 
00113         virtual void copy( const CMSProperties* source ) = 0;
00114 
00120         virtual CMSProperties* clone() const = 0;
00121 
00125         virtual void clear() = 0;
00126
